name: Word Maze by POWGI
description:
Find the words and solve the maze! Trace a path through the letters to spell words from the category shown. To find the correct path, you'll visit every letter once.

Word Maze by POWGI contains 300 hand-crafted puzzles in varying sizes, which will keep you playing for hours! If you like word search puzzles, you'll love this new twist!

Please email support@powgi.com if you need assistance. POWGI has excellent support and we'd rather help you than get a bad review.
